enb_long_title: Seventh Subsidiary Body for Scientific and Technological Advice (SBSTA) and the Subsidiary Body for Implementation (SBI) Eighth Session of the Ad Hoc Group on the Berlin Mandate
sentences: Under pressure of time and, in some cases under fire, some negotiators are reporting an increasingly fraught atmosphere in Bonn.
'Between a rock and a hard place' was how one participant summed up the position of negotiators bound by and unable to draw back from highly publicized negotiating positions.
Suspicions about obstruction and splitting tactics are being quietly aired.
The only clear target to emerge thus far has been the US position, which has been fired on from all sides.
